name: Sniper
description:
Gameplay Introduction

The gameplay is mainly based on shooting, controlling a sniper to fight the enemy. The map has many walls that you can use as a cover. You can score points every time you defeat an enemy, and in this vast map you can snipe the enemy anywhere. However, they will also fight back when you get too close to the enemy, and the game ends when your health will be 0.

Game Features

The attack can be magnified by clicking the right mouse button and using the scope, making it easier for you to hit the target!
Pressing the "shift" key also accelerates, allowing you to switch sniper locations more quickly.
